L088 8 8
Sizes
Rating is available in sizes regular and small.
wk NY 43(250)
xh KRY 4.3 (250)
Behaviours
Rating value rounding
When presenting values, round up to the nearest first decimal for
text-based values (such as 4.26 into 4.3). Match the visual rating
for the value to the closest provided option by an 0.5 increment.
hk hy 43 In other words, 4.3 would be visually converted to the star
presentation of 4.5 instead of 4.
Clickable element
In the Rating component you can have the Rating content as a
clickable element, such as to be used as an anchor-link to
another place on the page.
ww WY 4.3(250)
Label for rating quantity
If you wish, you can add a label next to the rating quantity value.
In fact, if you have the space it requires, it is preferable to add it
for increased clarity. The label next to the rating quantity value
(250 ratings) has been reduced in the main component in order to keep the
component compact. Keep in mind that the brackets wrapping
the rating quantity label is part of the component.
w Ww Ww Ww ¥ 4.3 (250 ratings) w Ww Ww wv 4.3250 ratings

Internationalisation
RTL languages
The elements within the Rating component flips horizontally for
RTL languages.

Accessibility
The component has been validated for accessibility against WCAG 2.2 on May 21'st 2025.
Notes
¢ Even though the color of inactive stars may not have enough contrast to validate
from a color contrast standpoint, these counts as disabled decoration and hence
counts as an exemption to these rules. Having them use a more prominent color
would also reduce the contrast ratio to the active stars. We do however recommend
to display the textual rating value as well to reinforce the clarification.

Key Description
Tab If used, focus on the next action.
Shift + Tab If used, focus on the previous action.
Space / Enter Triggers action.
